sentence.Network_en: In the Homeric poems these Greek tribes speak one common language.

sentence.Network_en: The story of that Homeric fight got all around town.
sentence.Network_cn: 那场荷马式的大战立刻在全城镇里传开了.

sentence.Network_en: Krembala a kind of Cymbals mentioned in a Homeric poem to Apollo.
